Create a map of individual features

elsar_plot_feature.Rd

Create a map of individual features

Usage

elsar_plot_feature(
  raster_in,
  pus,
  legend_title = NULL,
  color_map = "viridis",
  invert_palette = FALSE,
  figure_path = NULL,
  no_legend = FALSE
)

Arguments

raster_in

The SpatRaster file to be plotted.

pus

SpatVector The planning units (PUs) to use as outline

legend_title

An optional legend title.

color_map

The name of the viridis palette to be used. Default is "viridis".

figure_path

An optional path to save the produced figures

no_legend

Logical. TRUE means no legend will be shown

Value

A ggplot object with a map of the feature

Examples

boundary_proj <- make_boundary(
  boundary_in = boundary_dat,
  iso3 = "NPL",
  iso3_column = "iso3cd"
  )

pus <- make_planning_units(
  boundary_proj = boundary_proj,
  pu_size = NULL,
  pu_threshold = 8.5e5,
  limit_to_mainland = FALSE
  )
#> [2025-05-06 10:43] pu_size not provided: estimating size to target <= 850000 PUs (allowing 5% tolerance).
#> [2025-05-06 10:43] Iteration 1: 741036 PUs at resolution 450 m
#> [2025-05-06 10:43] Iteration 2: 830662 PUs at resolution 425 m
#> [2025-05-06 10:43] Iteration 3: 937494 PUs at resolution 400 m
#> [2025-05-06 10:43] Exceeded soft threshold (892500); using best previous result.
#> [2025-05-06 10:43] Final PU layer: 830662 PUs at 425 m resolution.

wad_dat <- get_wad_data()

wadOut <- make_normalised_raster(
  raster_in = wad_dat,
  pus = pus,
  iso3 = "NPL"
  )

elsar_plot_feature(
raster_in = wadOut,
pus = pus,
legend_title = "wad"
)
#> <SpatRaster> resampled to 500507 cells.
#> Error in guide_colorbar(label = TRUE, frame.colour = "black", barwidth = 11,     barheight = 1.1, direction = "horizontal", title.position = "top",     title.hjust = 0.5): could not find function "guide_colorbar"
